text:
A true Marvel fan would never spread spoilers. But what if you are not one of those and just for the sake of having fun, you want to ruin the film for your friends, family or strangers?
Well, chances are that street justice will come into play and you might just get beaten up brutally. At least that’s what happened in Hong Kong, recently.
YouTube
A picture of a bloody man outside a theatre in Hong Kong is doing the rounds, and apparently, he is the man who spoiled the movie for others.
Twitter
According to reports, this man shouted spoilers, the movie’s ending in particular, to the fans who were walking in the queue to the theatre. This led to a violent outburst.
That what happens when you ruin a good film.https://t.co/NypSOh063D — Dr. Mike (@EmergMedDr) April 27, 2019
People left everything and started beating him. So much so, that he was left bruised and bloody right in front of the theatre.
Not that we are endorsing violence but why would anyone pull off such a stunt? I mean, don’t even try to put up spoilers on social media. Some Marvel fan will find you and come to your home to beat you up. Be a true Marvel fan. Enjoy Avengers: Endgame and let others enjoy it too. For true Marvel fans, it’s an experience of a lifetime. Don't ruin it.
